column6: name: "1.1 310 Create FFM platform administrative user",

column7:
description: "Objective: As a tester I should be able to register OT member with email, password, username, first and last name. 

SE:Shahed PO:Pranto:Tester:Rema

Expected Result: As a tester I should be able to register OT member. 


Actual Result: Sucessfully registered OT member. 

Test Result: "message": "Sucessfully registered admin user Hall", status": "sucess"

Status Code: 201 Created 

Test Status: Pass"

Test Result: "message": "Sucessfully registered admin user Coffee", status": "sucess"S

column6: name: "1.1 310 Create OT Member without username",

column7:
description: "Objective: As a tester I should not be able to register a OT member without a username.

SE: Shahed PO:Pranto Tester:Rema

Expected Result: As a tester I should not be able to register an OT member without a username. 

Actual Result: I was not able to register an OT member without a username. 

Test Result:{
    "message": [
        "username must be non-empty"
    ],
    "status": "failed"
}

Status Code: 403 FORBIDDEN

Test Status: Pass"
